ygData.subject: Re: Lambent Quest Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Some guy (Valton? - anonymous) was hopping back and forth between Oasis and S Ro last night shouting in classic kewl dOOd (I m surprised my language skill was
ygData.messageBody:
Some guy (Valton? - anonymous) was hopping back and forth between Oasis and
S Ro last night shouting in classic kewl dOOd (I'm surprised my language
skill was high enough to make it out - not the brightest HEF to fall off the
tree stand) that he was looking for SGs. Later he was auctioning a lambent
stone! I didn't query him, so don't know if he actually had one or was
selling loot rights (if No Drop). Anyway, assuming he was not a bard <g> it
appears that other classes are already aware of the value of these new
stones and are attempting to profit from their seeming low supply.

Operaman
Meandering Maestro
Killing Caimens and Dervs whilst dreaming of his far off Lambent future
Innoruuk

----- Original Message -----
From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 10:41 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent Quest Update


> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
>
> "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
> >
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > called the wife. out of the 3 basalt gargoyles in the spider hall, one
> > dropped a basalt carapace her first pull. out of the shin ghoul knights
in
> > the bedroom, one dropped the shin greaves. i am liking this so far.
now
> > the bad news. 7 sand giants, 5 Griffins, 3 Hill Giants and NO lambent
> > stones. argh. i told her to petition and make sure they are in the
game.
>
> I got a lambent stone off the only hill giant I found all night (I'm not
> kidding!)
>
> I also got both runes from the clops brothers in WK. (Choon and
> Proon(?) with the top of the rune of the one eye and middle of the rune
> of the one eye respectively)
>
> Now my question is... how hard are the Solusek Mage and Solusek
> Champion?
>
> Any info appreciated.
>
> All the above items are Lore and Nodrop. An interesting if frustrating
> thing is that the runes of the one eye are COMPLETELY identical in
> appearance and name, but different items.
>
> Jyzan
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
